metadata.title: CVE-2023-35702 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the FSTLEB128 varint functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .fstfile can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concernsthe fstReaderVarint32 function.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
